snippet: A relatively modest ad campaign will be the government’s first directly financed attack against tobacco addiction.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention will unleash a series of television and newspaper advertisements highlighting the grisly toll of smoking, campaign that federal health officials hope will renew the stalled decline in the share of Americans who smoke.
lead_paragraph: A relatively modest ad campaign will be the government’s first directly financed attack against tobacco addiction.

headline.seo: C.D.C. Finances Nationwide Antismoking Ad Campaign, a First
